data.name: Warframe: Sure Footed Pinnacle Pack
data.detailed_description:
BONUS: Receive the exclusive Lex Onyx Skin and Lex Weapon for free! (Limit one per account.) The Lex Onyx Skin is only available with the purchase of a Pinnacle Pack.

1,500 Platinum to use towards new Warframes, Weapons, Equipment and more
150,000 Credits to assist in making new upgrades to your Arsenal
20 Random Mod Cards to instantly upgrade your Arsenal
10 Rare Mod Cards to add hard-to-find modifications to your Inventory
Sure Footed Mod to increase the Warframe’s knockdown resistance
Rapid Resilience Mod to reduce the time Status Effects affect the Warframe
Speed Drift Mod to increase Sprint Speed and Casting Speed
Battering Maneuver Mod to increase the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthen the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch, and add Impact damage to Bullet Jump
3 Exilus Adapters to instantly unlock an Exilus Mod Slot for Mobility and Utility advancements
3-Day Resource and Drop Chance Booster to double the chance and amount of pickups
3-Day Affinity and Credit Booster to quickly level up your Arsenal

*The stats displayed in the above Mod images depict Max Rank stats all new Mods start Unranked

data.short_description: The Sure Footed Pinnacle Pack gives you the best in Warframe right away with massive amounts of Platinum, Credits, Mod Cards and more! BONUS: Get the Steam-exclusive Lex Onyx Skin and the Lex Weapon for free!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 8600 GT or ATI Radeon HD 3600
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
